publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3938 Ms Sandra White: Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Youth Scotland’s Progress Report 2006—That the Parliament welcomes the 2006 progress report from LGBT Youth Scotland; notes that, while there may be as many as 100,000 young people who are lesbian, gay, bisexual or transgender, only around 6% have come out by the time they are 16; applauds the positive work done by the group in liaising with local authorities, the police, education authorities, health services, government and others to help shape policy, and fully supports it in its quest to help ease the transition of young people into adulthood.
S2M-3938 Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Youth Scotland’s Progress Report 2006 (lodged on 8 February 2006) Iain Smith*

S2M-3938 Ms Sandra White: Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Youth Scotland’s Progress Report 2006—That the Parliament welcomes the 2006 progress report from LGBT Youth Scotland; notes that, while there may be as many as 100,000 young people who are lesbian, gay, bisexual or transgender, only around 6% have come out by the time they are 16; applauds the positive work done by the group in liaising with local authorities, the police, education authorities, health services, government and others to help shape policy, and fully supports it in its quest to help ease the transition of young people into adulthood. Supported by: Iain Smith
S2M-3938 Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Youth Scotland’s Progress Report 2006 (lodged on 8 February 2006) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3938 Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Youth Scotland’s Progress Report 2006 (lodged on 8 February 2006) Susan Deacon*
